upgrade.!description:
Upgrades an OData v4 model to a Draft Model. Throws an error if it is not a draft enabled service

The result of this function will mix new functions into instances of the following classes

  • {@link sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel}
  • {@link sap.ui.model.odata.v4.Context}
Read the sections {@link sap.fe.model.DraftModel.upgradedModel} and {@link sap.fe.model.DraftModel.upgradedContext} for more information about the added functions

upgradeOnDemand.!description: Upgrades an OData v4 model to a Draft Model if it is a draft enbled service and leave it as is if not.

isDraftModel.!description:
Check if this is a draft model.
A model is considered a draft model if at least one entitySet of the OData service is annotated with one of the terms
  • com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1.DraftRoot
  • com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1.DraftNode

sap.fe.actions.draft.ICallback.!description: Interface for callbacks used in the functions

callActionImport.!type: fn(sActionName: String, oModel: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel, mParameters?: map) -> Promise

callBoundAction.!description: Calls a bound action for one or multiple contexts
callBoundAction.!type: fn(sActionName: String, contexts: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.Context, mParameters?: map) -> Promise

executeDraftValidationFunction.!description: Executes validation of a draft function

executeDraftActivationAction.!description: Activates a draft document. The draft will replace the sibling entity and will be deleted by the backend

executeDraftEditAction.!description: Creates a new draft from an active document

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.fe.controllerextensions.Routing with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.mvc.ControllerExtension.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

navigateToContext.!description: Creates and navigates a message page to show an error

setDirtyState.!description: This sets the dirty state of an entity set in the app which can later be fetched via via getDirtyState, for example, to be used in order to decide if a binding refresh is required or not

initializeRouting.!description: This initializes and extends the routing as well as the attaching to hash changes

getDirtyState.!description: Returns the dirty state of the given entity set

getMetadata.!description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.fe.controllerextensions.Routing.

activateDocument.!description: activates a document and closes sticky session

discardDocument.!description: discards a document and closes sticky session

editDocumentInStickySession.!description: Opens a sticky session to edit a document

activateDocument.!description:
Creates an active document from a draft document

The function supports several hooks as there is a certain coreography defined

createDraftFromActiveDocument.!description:
Creates a draft document from an existing document

The function supports several hooks as there is a certain coreography defined

fnCreateDocument.!description: Creates new document in sticky session/ draft

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.fe.controllerextensions.Transaction with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.mvc.ControllerExtension.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

handleDocumentModifications.!description: Sets the document to modified state on patch event

_showDiscardPopover.!description: Shows a popover if it needs to be shown. TODO: Popover is shown if user has modified any data. TODO: Popover is shown if there's a difference from draft admin data.

_getBindingParameters.!description: Get the query parameters for bound action from side effect, if annotated for provided action TODO: Add support for $expand when the model supports it.

getMetadata.!description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.fe.controllerextensions.Transaction.

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.fe.controllerextensions.AppState with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.mvc.ControllerExtension.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

cleanupAppState.!description: cleans up the app state handling

requestAppStateModel.!description: creates (if not yet done) a new app state model for a given ID and returns it

getMetadata.!description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.fe.controllerextensions.AppState.

getDraftAccessModel.!description: Mixin for {@link sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel}. Returns the internal JSON Model aka DraftAccessModel

sap.fe.model.DraftModel.EDITSTATE.!description: Enum for edit state of a document in an draft enabled service collection. Allows to simplify filtering on a set of documents as described by the individual state

UNCHANGED.!description: Active documents that don't have a draft document

ALL.!description: Active documents that don't have a corresponding draft and all own draft documents

UNSAVED_CHANGES.!description: Active documents that have draft documents by other users

LOCKED.!description: Active documents that are locked by other users

showUnboundMessages.!description: Shows all unbound (including technical) messages and removes those the ones which are transient
